alert.note: Alert for St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 4:21AM CST until December 31 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 2 to 3 miles in dense fog. * WHERE...Saint Louis City MO County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Dense fog will substantially reduce visibilities, to one-quarter mile or less, resulting in hazardous driving conditions in some areas. Motorists are advised to use caution and slow down, as objects on and near roadways will be seen only at close range. In addition, since temperatures are sub-freezing, be alert for frost, making for slippery roads, especially on bridge decks.
